DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Information Source Type Code PCORnet CDM Diagnosis Origin Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Where something is available or from where it originates._A coded value specifying an identifiable class of an entity or activity based on common qualities._Classification of diagnosis source.
